title: Sex, Lies and Muesli Yoghurt
description: Anna resorts to devious means to get rid of Miles's girlfriend, Delilah.

title: Brief Encounter
description: Miles is furious at being taken off a big fraud case and Egg starts to write a novel.

title: Father Figure
description: O'Donnell and Milly are on the verge of an affair, and Anna starts something with Jerry.

title: Let's Get It On
description: A night out clubbing comes back to haunt Anna as she is forced to defend Egg's dealer.

title: The Bi Who Came in from the Cold
How to Get in Bed by Advertising
Men Behaving Sadly
description: Ferdy visits Mia at home where her new man, Seb, tells him what he thinks of men like him.

title: Wish You Were Queer
description: Miles and Anna are rivals at work, and tensions continue to rise between Milly and Rachel.

title: One Bedding and a Funeral
description: Egg's younger brother Nat comes to stay and finds a friend in Kelly, and Kira dumps Jo.

title: Milly Liar
description: Miles has pre-nuptial stress, and Milly foolishly leaves her watch in O'Donnell's office.
